alert.note: Alert for Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 21 at 4:44AM MDT until March 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT MDT WEDNESDAY NIGHT ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph above 9000 feet. * WHERE...In Colorado, Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus. In Utah, Tavaputs Plateau. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to midnight MDT Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
